MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G46 postcode area of Thornliebank. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:06pm due to a safety concerned with the underground cable network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations are required and we require our specialist team to assist with repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:20 PM on Friday, 19 March 2021.
